favourite.article: When Christ was the Son of God before His incarnation, He had no human nature. After His resurrection He is the Son of God with humanity Uplifted, Sanctified, and Transformed out of resurrection. He is now both of humanity and divinity. He is both the seed of David and the Son of GOd. He is a wonderful person! (Life-study of Romans, pp. 19-20)
Yes. I remember this song that we sang at the SST.
I am Hyman. I am from China. I am so glad when I see many brothers and sisters here. I like these hymnal. HallelujahÔºÅ
I remember this song in our summer camp 5 years ago. This was truly touching our heart. He is the perfect pattern for us. Hallelujah!
We sang this at the Summer School of Truth. Thank You Lord for Your humanity!
Christ is the Genuine Man! Hallelujah! Praise the Lord from the church in Houston!
